sentences.sContent: An alternative route is along the Via Unione.
sentences.sCn: 另一条路线是沿着联合路走。

sentences.sContent: ...While alternative estimates of the damage from carbon emissions differ...
...which have long Viewed batteries and alternative forms of energy as a threat...
...The alternative would be playing on the computer or watching TV...
...Every time any official in Beijing deliberates publicly about seeking an alternative to the U...
...with alternative plans in place for even the most remote exchanges...
...Earlier this year a review paper by 20obesity experts set out the 7 most plausible alternative explanations for the epidemic...

synos.tran: 供选择的；选择性的；交替的

phrases.pCn: 没有别的办法了；没有其他选择
代用燃料；可替代燃料；人造液体燃料
v. 别无选择；只得；唯一的办法是
交替计划；可供选择的方案
替代，替代物；比较选择方案

remMethod.val: alter(改变状态， 其他的) ＋ native(…的) → 其他的 → 替换物

words.tran: 非此即彼；二者择一地；作为一种选择
交替地；轮流地；隔一个地

trans.tranCn: 两者选一的， 供选择的； 另类的
trans.tranOther: an alternative idea, plan etc is different from the one you have and can be used instead

trans.tranCn: 替换物，选择；选择的自由
trans.tranOther: something you can choose to do or use instead of something else
